data.body: Registry data should not be refetched aggressively during normal beads usage. Use stale caching and avoid duplicate consumers that trigger repeated network requests when settings/repo management is not active.
data.description: Registry data should not be refetched aggressively during normal beads usage. Use stale caching and avoid duplicate consumers that trigger repeated network requests when settings/repo management is not active.
data.title: Reduce unnecessary /api/registry polling on beads route
